sourcesContent:
import { Box, Text, Badge, SimpleGrid, Heading, Divider, } from "@chakra-ui/layout"; import { Image } from "@chakra-ui/image"; import { StarIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons"; import { background, position } from "@chakra-ui/styled-system"; const MoviesList = (props) => { const movies = props.movies; return (
Movies {movies.map((movie) => (
{movie.Rated} {movie.Genre} | {movie.Year}. {movie.Title} Cast: {movie.Actors} {movie.Plot} {movie.imdbRating}/10 ))}
); }; export default MoviesList;
